footer_text: Axur. Digital experiences made safe. All rights reserved.
label_tlp_desc: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP). Restrictions on how this information can be shared.
intro_title: Digital Protection: From Detection to Resolution
intro_text_dynamic: This report details the results of continuous monitoring for your brand, demonstrating Axur's capability to provide complete visibility and effective response to digital risks.
intro_text_static: This report details the results of our Proof of Concept (PoC), demonstrating Axur's capability to provide complete visibility and effective response to digital risks.
intro_text_closing: The following pages present a detailed analysis of detected threats, actions taken, and the tangible value our platform brings to your brand's security and integrity.
solutions_title: Complete Platform for Your Digital Protection
solutions_subtitle_1: Axur offers a complete solution for managing your digital risks.
solutions_subtitle_2: We protect your brand, your customers, and your business from online fraud and threats.
solutions_subtitle_3: From detection to takedown, our platform automates the entire process.
metrics_desc_tickets: Total number of signals collected by the platform.
metrics_desc_threats: Signals confirmed as real risks after analysis and validation.
metrics_desc_time: Estimated time your team would have spent manually collecting and validating these threats.
threats_desc: A total of {total} threats were detected. The chart shows main categories, highlighting the most frequent attack vectors.
stealer_action: Immediate Action: Force password reset for exposed users and prioritize isolating infected hosts.
stealer_critical_desc: Found {count} identities using variations of the company name in their passwords.
code_leak_action: Immediate Action: Rotate Production keys and API Keys immediately. Implement secret scanning in CI/CD pipeline.
incidents_desc: A total of {total} incidents were created. This chart details the relationship between raw detections and confirmed incidents.
roi_efficiency_desc: Equivalent to {hours} hours of manual analysis saved for your security team.
roi_intel_desc: Advanced risk profile based on {count} analyzed credentials.
op_time_saved_desc: Hours your team would have spent manually processing these signals and threats.
op_capacity_desc: Equivalent capacity of security analysts that Axur frees for strategic tasks.
op_response_desc: Median time from detection to first provider notification.
example_no_data: No evidence examples found in the selected period.
closing_subtitle: You've seen the risks. Now turn these results into continuous, 24/7 protection for your brand and customers.
closing_cta_activate_desc: Seamless transition from PoC to full protection.
deep_analytics_subtitle: Advanced insights computed from your threat data
ctx_risk_text: Digital risk monitoring is essential in today's interconnected world. This section provides an overview of the threats detected across the open, deep, and dark web. By identifying these risks early, we enable proactive mitigation strategies to protect your brand reputation and digital assets.
eff_text_hours: To manually analyze the threats processed by Axur, your team would have needed {hours} hours. This is equivalent to {analysts} full-time analysts dedicated solely to detection.
eff_text_speed: Threat management with Axur was 180x faster than the industry average. While a human takes ~30 mins per alert, our AI correlates threats in seconds.
narrative_phishing_pain: Modern phishing evades traditional filters. Attempting to cover the volume of 40 million new URLs daily is humanly impossible.
narrative_phishing_solution: Our AI visually inspects every site (Computer Vision), detecting fraud even without explicit brand mentions. We don't just detect; we take down in under 4 minutes.
narrative_stealer_pain: Stolen credentials from infected devices (Infostealers) allow attackers to bypass MFA by mimicking the user's digital fingerprint.
narrative_stealer_solution: Manually searching the Deep Web is inefficient. Axur scans 42 billion credentials to find only those that pose a real risk to your active sessions.
narrative_takedown_pain: Managing takedowns across different platforms requires handling endless bureaucracy and forms for each provider.
narrative_takedown_solution: Axur has trusted integrations with these platforms. What takes a lawyer days, we request en masse with a 98.9% success rate.
narrative_timeline_text: Cybercriminals don't respect office hours. {percent}% of critical threats were detected outside business hours. Without 24/7 automation, these would remain active for days.
closing_value_intro: Acquiring Axur isn't just buying software; it's adding an army of virtual analysts to your SOC.
closing_value_item_1_desc: We eliminate noise so your analysts only see what matters.
closing_value_item_2_desc: From days to minutes. We drastically minimize exposure time.
closing_value_item_3_desc: We provide full context: 'Who, How, and Methodology', eliminating false positives so your team focuses only on real threats.
narrative_virality_pain_primary: Your brand was shared **{share_count} times** in {source_count} different fraud communities, including high-activity groups like '**{top_source}**'. This 'chatter' often precedes a massive wave of attacks.
narrative_virality_solution_primary: Axur has infiltrated these invite-only channels (Telegram, Discord, Dark Web). We detect the threat at the *planning* stage, before it reaches your customers.
narrative_virality_pain_fallback: Attacks often incubate silently in closed groups on Telegram and the Dark Web, completely invisible to standard perimeter defenses.
narrative_virality_solution_fallback: Our Deep Web surveillance is active 24/7. In this period, **no critical viral campaigns** were detected, validating that your brand is currently not a 'trending topic' for fraudsters.
roi_precise_text_primary: Real Data: Your median takedown time was **{median_minutes} minutes**. This speed neutralizes phishing campaigns before they can claim victims.
roi_precise_text_fallback: Managing threats with Axur is **180x faster** than industry average. AI correlation happens in seconds, replacing 30-minute manual triage per alert.
intent_fmt_primary: Our AI Classifiers reveal that **{percent}%** of attacks aim for **{top_intent}**, indicating a specific campaign against your customer base.
intent_fmt_fallback: Attacks are categorized by technical vector. Phishing remains the dominant method for initiating fraud.
geo_fmt_primary: We detected attacks originating from **{count} countries**. The primary source of hostile infrastructure is **{top_country}**.
geo_fmt_fallback: Geographic attribution reveals jurisdiction overlaps. Monitoring international infrastructure helps predict future campaigns.
ctx_stealer_text: Infostealers are malware designed to harvest sensitive information from infected devices. They collect login credentials, cookies, and system details, often sold on dark web marketplaces. Detecting these logs allows us to identify compromised employee or customer accounts before they are used for unauthorized access.
ctx_leak_text: Developers sometimes inadvertently commit sensitive keys, tokens, or credentials to public repositories. These 'secrets' can grant attackers access to cloud infrastructure, databases, or internal services. Continuous monitoring of public code repositories is crucial to detect and revoke these keys immediately.
ctx_takedown_text: Takedown is the process of removing malicious or infringing content from the internet. When a threat is confirmed, our automated systems and legal team interact with hosting providers, registrars, and social media platforms to enforce removal, neutralizing the threat at its source.
